radiographic_examinations.findings: Slight migration of the pancreatic duct stent inferolaterally to the region of the cecum. Retained oral contrast in the right colon. No free air in the abdomen. Phleboliths and vascular calcifications in the lower pelvis. Unchanged severe degenerative disease of the lower lumbar spine and bilateral hip joints. Bilateral pleural effusions, right greater than left, with associated airspace disease.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Slight migration of the pancreatic duct stent; unchanged severe degenerative disease of the lower lumbar spine and bilateral hip joints.
